meanings.definition: A musical instrument invented by Chladni in 1802. It consisted of glass rods which, when vibrated by friction, produced musical tones.
meanings.english_definition: A musical instrument invented by Chladni in 1802. It consisted of glass rods which, when vibrated by friction, produced musical tones.

etymology.value: From Greek ἀδιάφονος (adiáphoros, “indifferent”), because the instrument was intended to produce tones of equal intensity.
